thread.section_title: DoYouSpain.com opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre DoYouSpain.com | doyouspain.com | 11 de 485
thread.title: Sally

author: Sally
title: Sally
text: Having read several unfavourable reviews I must say I was a little hesitant about booking. We had used Doyouspain previously with no problem. Initially booked car for a fortnight then changed our mind for 2 separate periods of hire during a 3 week period. I rebooked the first week and then thought I'd wait to make sure I'd got the refund for the cancellation first. I had an almost immediate acknowledgement of my wish to cancel with a message that refund would appear in my account in 3-4 working days. Refund was received in 2 days. Have now booked the second hire!!
